name: `Baby Corn Run Race Free - Easy Kids Jump Chase Racing by Top Crazy Games
name_original: `Baby Corn Run Race Free - Easy Kids Jump Chase Racing by Top Crazy Games
description:
Try Baby Corn Run for FREE!!!

- Fun, challenging, and ADDICTING gameplay!
- A MUST HAVE game on the App Store!
- The family and kids will love it!

SPECIAL -3 FREE HEART REVIVES for rating this game via the shop menu.

Reviews:
"Eat Your Veggies With The Arcade Hit, Baby Corn Run"
"Baby Corn Run is not a sequel to the childhood thriller series of “Children of the Corn.” It’s a cute, fun, and never ending challenge for children or adults." -AppAdvice.com

"Do you like to challenge? Do you want to fight with crow? Who do you think will win? Now you can test using Baby Corn Run. Baby Corn Run is a new cartoon game with beautiful interface." - Best10Apps.com

---------------------------------------------------

Baby Corn Run is an exciting game that will make you keep coming back.

This addicting and challenging gameplay goes on forever to meet your entertainment needs. The family and kids will love it!

Take Baby Corn on an adventure run and help him cover a huge distance. Jump over scarecrows and crows and collect lives as you run, jump and dodge.

There are different obstacles that makes your run even more interesting. So WATCH OUT!

Baby Corn's life chances are limited so cover the maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global gamecenter leaderboard

Challenge yourself with nine achievements. Can you achieve them all?

This is a universal game that works on iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch

- This version is AD SUPPORTED.

FEATURES:
- Beautiful retina graphics! Looks AMAZING on iPhone 5 and 5s.
- Use intuitive touch gestures to to guide baby corn
- Amazing animations and sound

PLEASE NOTE:
- Baby Corn Run Race Free - Easy Kids Jump Chase Racing is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
